title: [K-12] Simulation-Based Language Mastery Learning: Short-Intensive Course Applying Distributed Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental language proficiency and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: Learners participate in simulation activities using personal devices and receive scenario-based training similar to real language use situations. Must meet proficiency standards through formative assessments with immediate feedback to advance to the next stage

learning_goals: Learners can use appropriate linguistic expressions for daily conversational contexts with over 80% accuracy in a simulated environment
Learners engage in repeated spaced practice sessions until achieving at least 85% proficiency in target language functions
Over 90% of learners report increased confidence in language use through self-assessment at course completion
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
